## Versioning

<!-- This project uses conventional commits for versioning -->
- [ ] I've used proper conventional commit format in my commits

  - `feat:` or `feat(scope):` for minor updates
  - `fix!:`, `feat!:` or adding `BREAKING CHANGE:` for major updates
